file_content.text: Tell Rennie I'll be there as soon as I can.
Did you destroy that file? The Justicars could be coming to check on us any minute now!
Your sister sent me. You're free.
Your sister sent me. You're free.
Rennie? But she's... she's a little girl. How could she...?
And why? Oh, now they're going to kill me! Quick, can you, uh, put that back... um, get it working again or something?
You want to be the Justicars' captive?
A little gratitude wouldn't kill you.
I can't escape. As long as the Justicars have me in their records as a curfew-breaker, they'll just hunt me down again.
And if they get me for going AWOL, they'll use torture! Unless....
Look, if you really want to help, go into their computers and delete my file. I'll hide out somewhere. When things die down, I'll find Rennie again.
